system.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Pz4kR6wS0xT3yU9v]{put a face to a name} or study a sanctuary, gathering spot, or place of power, roll with MIND instead of the relevant Circle. You always get to ask the MC an additional question about the person or place in question, even on a miss.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you don't know them or you owe them, MC's choice.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value: On a hit, you know their reputation; the MC will tell you what most people know about them.

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, you know their reputation; the MC will tell you what most people know about them.

On a 10+, you've dealt with them before; learn something interesting and useful about them or they owe you a Debt, your choice.
